text: Mam ay mapen yad okok, nɨbi nɨgɨm. God binɨb lum awl yɨmgeptek mɨdebal okok kɨlop aglek, kɨli Klays nop gos lɨnɨgel amnɨgab. Pen kɨli abe nop mapen lel nɨŋɨd, ne binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ñɨn ak, binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop dɨnɨgab. Takaw God ne binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak anɨb ak, ne gɨnɨgab.
